dict.acceptation: 恐怖，可怕的事物；嫌恶，痛恨；讨厌的人或事；〈口〉非常丑恶；

sent.orig: He was horror-struck, horror-stricken at the scene.
sent.trans: 他看到那种情景，吓得打冷颤。

sent.orig: Rather an end with horror than a horror without end.
sent.trans: 宁要恐怖有结尾，也不要无结尾的恐怖。

sent.orig: He was horror-struck, horror-stricken to see a horrible scene.
sent.trans: 他看到可怕情景，吓得发抖。

sent.orig: It is scared horror all, be still drugs horror? Is having a lot of things destined?
sent.trans: 究竟是恐惧恐怖，还是毒品恐怖？是不是有很多事都是注定的？

sent.orig: He went out, and the horror retreated.
sent.trans: 他这才走出去了。恐怖打消了。
